title: Little River Canyon National Preserve: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News        Learn how to make your 4th grade field trip to our park for FREE! Click here here to learn more.  Â    Effective Immediately: Little River Canyon National Preserve announces closure of three Backcountry Campsites because of Health and Safety Concerns. The three campsites are normally open February 1 each year. During inspection it was determined the pit toilets were unserviceable. For more information please click here.
